mapper.select: select e.examineId,e.companyId,c.companyName,e.comboId,cb.comboName,e.exName,e.exSex,e.exAge,e.exPhone,to_char(e.exDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') exDate,e.conclusion,e.exSuggest,e.exGuide,e.adminId,e.conclusionDate,e.exStatus,p.parameterName from tbExamine e,tbCompany c,tbCombo cb,tbParameter p where e.companyId=c.companyId and e.comboId=cb.comboId and e.exStatus=p.parameterId and e.examineId=#{examineId}
select examineId from tbExamine where companyId=#{companyId}
select exName,exSex,exAge,exPhone,exStatus from tbExamine where companyId=#{companyId}
